architectural_resources: Web application / HTTP API (Express server listening on PORT/3000) — index.js
AWS Elastic Container Registry (ECR) repository (implied by workflow: docker login/push to $ECR_REPOSITORY) — .github/workflows/main.yml
AWS Elastic Container Service (ECS) cluster/service deployment target (implied: aws ecs update-service --cluster my-ecs-cluster --service my-service) — .github/workflows/main.yml
